thread.title: Thailand CONNECT The World: China MICE Commemorative Dinner 2015
thread.title_full: Thailand CONNECT The World: China MICE Commemorative Dinner 2015

author: mich@girlracer.me.uk (Michelle Chenery)
title: Thailand CONNECT The World: China MICE Commemorative Dinner 2015
text:
Thailand CONNECT The World: China MICE Commemorative Dinner 2015 Thailand CONNECT The World: China MICE Commemorative Dinner 2015 Details Category: Venues & Events Created on Monday, 12 October 2015 09:10 The Thailand Convention and Exhibition Bureau (Public Organization), or TCEB, recently staged the Thailand CONNECT The World: China MICE Commemorative Dinner 2015 to reassure confidence in Thailand as a gateway to ASEAN success for business events stakeholders from China, as well as to mark the 40th anniversary of Thai-Chinese relations. 
During the event, TCEB and strategic partner under the Thailand’s MICE United II, the Ratchaprasong Square Trade Association (RSTA), have jointly introduced the Thailand CONNECT Welcome Package, offering special privileges for a superb Thai experience in the heart of Bangkok to all Chinese MICE travellers. The event took place on 17 September 2015 at Hyatt on the Bund hotel, Shanghai, the People's Republic of China, and attracted more than 70 Chinese media for the showcase of Thailand’s five MICE Cities, followed by a dinner reception full of memorable Thai experiences.
